Better than HL2
Fast-paced FPS with a bunch of aliens thrown in. It's a classic for a reason.

Looking past the graphics (It was made in 1998, what do you expect?), this game blew me away. I had always heard how remarkable the Half-Life series was but never experienced it for myself. 

I started the game and couldn't stop playing. The story was so engaging, the combat was actually fun, and the puzzles made me stop a couple times and really think. 

There were times when I was actually startled by enemies and had to react fast. There were times where I stopped to just appreciate the scenery and atmosphere they had created in this game. There were times where I laughed at how the scientists walked with lead shoes.

Great purchase. If you haven't played Half-Life, give it a shot. You get more than your money's worth. Happy Gaming!

I don't know much about "classic" video games but I've loved playing through the Half-Life game(s). I'm a sucker for "low-quality" games that wont make me dizzy or freak me out (srsly, if i had to see headcrabs in today's realistic hd i wouldn't even open the game) that I can spend hours exploring/learning/playing.
It's a good game with an intriguing story and gameplay.

It's a really good game.
the way it feels to play this game is special, it's fascinating.
this game is mona lisa in the game world. 
Thanks valve for making this game.

Es el clasico Half Life. Todavia no me lo puse a pasar enserio. Dato curioso que si alguien quiere usarlo con trucos, ya que hice la prueba (Aunque mejor es jugarlo bien sin trampas) es que ya no hace falta modificar un parametro en el exe como en el antiguo. The literal definition of a god tier game. Only issue is the occasional insta-kill if you're standing in the wrong place at the wrong time. The story is told mostly through environment and dialogue with other NPC's, which can be quiet if you're not directly looking for it. Masterpiece of game design.

Half-Life is a great game especially for it's time period. At this point few FPS really broke the mold in terms of gameplay. Doom set the gold standard but it was never really developed upon. Valve takes it to a whole new level with a pretty lengthy title might I add. I easily spent 10 hours on Hard mode before I finished at I am ready to replay it already. Especially considering this game also has an exciting groundbreaking physics engine especially for 1998. Overall this game is definitely worth the $10 and I hope it brings in new and old fans to the Half-Life franchise.

Uno de los clÃ¡sicos de Valve, buen juego a pesar de los aÃ±os (ya mÃ¡s de 20), lamentablemente mucha gente pasara de el por sus grÃ¡ficos que, si se toma en cuenta la fecha de lanzamiento son excelentes. La historia es interesante y ayuda mucho para motivar al jugador a continuar, las mecÃ¡nicas de juego han envejecido muy bien, si es que tomamos  en cuenta  solo las de disparo.  Las partes de plataformeo son pÃ©simas, estas demandan precisiÃ³n pero lamentablemente el salto no esta bien calibrado (no deberÃ­a estarlo en exceso, es un shooter), lo que ocasiona que en las partes de plataforma mueras por un error en el control y no por el jugador, no rompe la experiencia pero aveces puede ser un poco de frustrante. La atmÃ³sfera es impecable, te puedes sentir legÃ­timamente solo lo cual lo ayuda a que se quede en tu memoria. Si no te importa que los grÃ¡ficos no sean de ultima generaciÃ³n, buscas una buena historia o una experiencia memorable,  y te gustan los shooters juÃ©galo, no lo dudes, recomendado.
